name: Presence (itch)
description:
Welcome to the world of Presence. Here you are invited to grow a garden by opening your mind, losing yourself in exploration of a virtual world.

The purpose of this project was to explore the idea of games as a relaxation tool though player presence and FX art. Presence is the idea that a virtual environment becomes the dominant reality for the user exploring it. This prototype was created as my honours project at Abertay University.

This is a very early prototype, which will be updated frequently during April/May 2015. Bugs/crashes are pretty likely at this stage, so don't hesitate to contact me if you find some!

Mac demo will be available May 2015.

Contact Me: amystevens1@btinternet.com, @AmesyFlo, amyflorence.co.uk

Music and Sound Design by Doug Waters: https://soundcloud.com/dwmusicproductions
